Name: Baikonur Cosmodrome
World achievements: The first satellite  Sputnik 1  was launched

Name: Ohsumi
World achievements: The smallest satellite launch vehicle (L4S; 94t weight  14m diameter)

Name: FSW0 Äì 10m (1975) FSW1B Äì 4m (1992)[69] Beidou Äì 05m (till 2007)[70]
Sakigake
World achievements: The first interplanetary launch by solid rocket (M3SII)

Name: Yang Liwei
Asian First: First man in space launched by an Asian space program

Name: Hayabusa
World achievements: The first asteroid ascent  sample return from an asteroid

Name: FY1C
World achievements: Highest in history with altitude 865 km  also the fastest with speed 18k miles

Name: Japanese Experiment Module
Asian First: Manned foundations in space (STS123  STS124  STS127)
World achievements: The world's largest pressurized volume in space[75]

Name: Tianlian I
Asian First: Indigenous Tracking & Data Relay Satellite System First TDRS system to support manned missions

Name: Moon Impact Probe
World achievements: Discovered water on the Moon before impact[76][77]

Name: IKAROS
World achievements: The first spacecraft to successfully demonstrate solarsail technology in interplanetary space

Name: Chang'e 2
Asian First: Lunar probe with extended deep space missions (asteroid mission to 4179 Toutatis)

Name: Shenzhou 9
Asian First: First manned space docking by an Asian country (with Tiangong1)

Name: Chang'e 3/Yutu
Asian First: First lunar soft landing and lunar rover by an Asian country

Name: Mars Orbiter Mission
Asian First: First successful Mars mission by an Asian country
World achievements: First Martian mission by a country to succeed on the first attempt Third country to do so after the USSR and the USA

Name: PSLVC37
Asian First: First to successfully launch and deploy 104 satellites simultaneously from a single rocket (PSLV C37)[79][80]
World achievements: First country in the world to launch more than 100 satellites at one go

Name: Chang'e 4
Asian First: First soft landing on the far side of the Moon
World achievements: First soft landing on the far side of the Moon by any country Landed with Yutu2 rover
